inputPath.description: InputPath is the path to the directory containing KCL files (*.k) to execute, or path to a single .k file.

outputPath.description: OutputPath is the path where the KCL output should be written. If not specified, output will be returned in the step result.

args.description: Args are additional arguments to pass to the KCL execution as key-value pairs.

settings.description: Settings are key-value pairs to pass to the KCL execution.
